*Java*

Download and unpack the [http://download.forge.objectweb.org/asm/asm-3.2-bin.zip ASM instrumentation framework]

Check out Dimmunix Java agent by running
{{{
svn checkout http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/DimmunixInstrumentation
}}}

Check out Dimmunix source code and Dimmunix tests by running
{{{
svn checkout http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/DimmunixASM
svn checkout http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/DimmunixASMTests
}}}

Go to the root folder of Dimmunix source code (i.e., ../DimmunixASM folder) and compile Dimmunix by typing: 
{{{
ant
}}}

*C/C++*

Checkout Dimmunix from https://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/DimmunixLDPreloadEfficient, by running:
{{{
svn co http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/DimmunixLDPreloadEfficient
}}}

To compile Dimmunix, go into its folder and run:
{{{
scons
}}}
This will create Dimmunix shared library libdimmunix.so , that can be linked to any C/C++ application.
